title: Mac Jones vs. Cam Newton, Preseason Week 3 Preview, Opening Day Starting Quarterbacks, Melissa Etheridge, Younghoe Koo Interviews
itunes:title: Mac Jones vs. Cam Newton, Preseason Week 3 Preview, Opening Day Starting Quarterbacks, Melissa Etheridge, Younghoe Koo Interviews
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Nate Burleson, Peter Schrager and Kyle Brandt break down the league's top quarterback battles as Mac Jones and Cam Newton of the New England Patriots Jimmy Garoppolo and Trey Lance of the San Francisco 49ers fight to be named the opening day starters. The crew also discusses the position battle winners such as QB Teddy Bridgewater with the Denver Broncos Trevor Lawrence with the Jacksonville Jaguars. Atlanta Falcons kicker Younghoe Koo and Academy Award and Grammy Award winning musician Melissa Etheridge joins the show for a live interview with Kay, Nate, Peter and Kyle. The crew previews the biggest matchups ahead of the final week of preseason games. The hosts tackle a range of topics including the biggest news headlines from around the NFL and which players need to make the biggest impact in the final preseason games.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
